summary.span: 表示 Unicode 标量值（[ U+0000..U+D7FF ]，含首尾值；或 [ U+E000..U+10FFFF ]，含首尾值）。

span.span: Represents a Unicode scalar value ([ U+0000..U+D7FF ], inclusive; or [ U+E000..U+10FFFF ], inclusive).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型的构造函数和转换运算符将验证输入，因此使用者可以调用 Api，假定基础 实例的格式正确。This type's constructors and conversion operators validate the input, so consumers can call the APIs assuming that the underlying instance is well-formed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般约定是在循环中调用此方法，通过 `charsConsumed` 循环的每次迭代上的元素来切分 `source` 缓冲区。The general convention is to call this method in a loop, slicing the `source` buffer by `charsConsumed` elements on each iteration of the loop. 在循环的每次迭代中，如果数据已成功解码，则 `result` 包含实标量值，或者，如果数据未成功解码，则包含 。On each iteration of the loop, `result` contains the real scalar value if the data was successfully decoded, or it contains if the data was not successfully decoded. 在循环访问循环时，此模式提供了方便的自动 U + FFFD 替换无效序列。This pattern provides convenient automatic U+FFFD substitution of invalid sequences while iterating through the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般约定是在循环中调用此方法，通过 `bytesConsumed` 循环的每次迭代上的元素来切分 `source` 缓冲区。The general convention is to call this method in a loop, slicing the `source` buffer by `bytesConsumed` elements on each iteration of the loop. 在循环的每次迭代中，如果成功进行解码，则 `result` 包含实标量值; 如果数据无法成功解码，则包含 。On each iteration of the loop, `result` contains the real scalar value if successfully decoded, or it contains if the data could not be successfully decoded. 在循环访问循环时，此模式提供了方便的自动 U + FFFD 替换无效序列。This pattern provides convenient automatic U+FFFD substitution of invalid sequences while iterating through the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与 非常类似，只是它允许调用方反向循环，而不是转发。This method is very similar to , except it allows the caller to loop backward instead of forward. 典型的调用约定是，在循环的每次迭代时，调用方应切分 `source` 缓冲区的最终 `charsConsumed` 元素。The typical calling convention is that on each iteration of the loop, the caller should slice off the final `charsConsumed` elements of the `source` buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于查询 ，并将结果与 进行比较。This method is equivalent to querying and comparing the result against . 根据[Unicode 稳定性策略](https://www.unicode.org/policies/stability_policy.html)，控制字符集永久固定为 `[ U+0000..U+001F ]` 和 `[ U+007F..U+009F ]`的联合。Per [Unicode stability policies](https://www.unicode.org/policies/stability_policy.html), the set of control characters is permanently fixed to be the union of `[ U+0000..U+001F ]` and `[ U+007F..U+009F ]`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .
